Directionality.intro_template: Alex and Blaine were both called by the same survey company. The survey company asked them each several questions. One question concerned their take on [Topic]. Both Alex and Blaine agreed that [Claim]. They were then asked whether any decision was involved in coming to have this belief.
Directionality.statement_a: Alex said, "I decided to believe that [Claim]"
Directionality.statement_b: Blaine said, "I decided whether to believe that [Claim]"
